name: CATRAP
synopsis: One day a boy and a girl going out for a picnic mistakenly stumble into a forbidden haunted house and are turned into cats. In order to return to normal, Catboy and Catgirl have to make their way through 100 rooms of an underground labyrinth! Help Catgirl and Catboy push around blocks to bridge a path to defeat the monsters. If you make a mistake, simply use the rewind function and travel back in time to correct it. CATRAP is more than just a game of mindbending intrigue and action. Be the architect of the underground labyrinth and make your own levels of intricate mazes. Whether you choose to be a maze builder or a maze solver, we know you can help Catboy and Catgirl land on their feet.
